description:
From deep within the dark lands of Mordor, Sauron's power grows. Protect Middle-earth from his advancing ranks in Lord of the Rings: Middle-earth Defense! Position your Heroes - Aragorn, Gandalf, Legolas and more - and deploy Ally Units such as Elven Archers or Gondor Soldiers to defend strongholds from relentless waves of attacking enemy forces. In Story mode, play through 12 levels set in 5 unique environments with story elements based on all three films in the trilogy. Or opt for Endless Mode, where you'll face endless waves of attackers until you’ve run out of Battle Hit Points. Try to best your high score in each environment! The battle for Middle-earth has begun, stand and defend against the evil of the Dark Lord Sauron.

- Tower Defense-style gameplay with expertly crafted 3D environments based on story elements from all three films in the Lord of the Rings trilogy.

- 2 gameplay modes: Story and Endless

- Story Mode: 190 total waves across 12 levels set in 5 environments

- Endless Mode: Choose an environment from the game and face wave after wave of attackers until you've exhausted your Battle Hit Points

- Position Heroes (towers) such as Aragorn, Gandalf, Legolas, Gimli, and Arwen; and deploy Ally Units such as Elven Archers, Gondor Soldiers and Riders of Rohan

- Heroes can use special attacks to cause more enemy damage

- Set blockades to create chokepoints for waves of invaders
